summary.para: The TCP_BOOLEAN_OPTIONAL enumeration defines the states that a caller can specify when updating a member in the read/write information for a TCP connection.

remarks.para: The TCP_BOOLEAN_OPTIONAL enumeration is defined on Windows Vista and later.

The collection of extended statistics on a TCP connection are enabled and disabled using calls to the and functions where the type of extended statistics specified is one of values from the enumeration type. A value from the TCP_BOOLEAN_OPTIONAL enumeration is used to specify how a member in the structure should be updated to enable or disable extended statistics on a TCP connection for bandwidth estimation.
